Translations.Text: Verily, man is in a state of loss
Save those who believe and do good works, and bid each other to truth, and bid each other endurance
Woe to every slanderous scandal-monger and backbiter
Who collects wealth and counts it
He thinks that his wealth can immortalize him
Not so! He shall be hurled into El´Hutamah
Ah, what shall make you understand what El´Hutamah is
Lo! It closes in as a vault on them
See you not how your Lord dealt with the people of the elephant
Did He not make their stratagem lead them astray
And sent down on them birds in flocks
To pelt them with stones of baked clay
And make them like stalks left by herbage eaten down
